scripts.build:netlify: npm run build:clean && npm run build:landing && npm run build:admin && npm run build:student && npm run create:redirects
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist dist/admin dist/student
scripts.build:landing: echo 'Building landing page...' && cp -r landing-page/* dist/
scripts.build:admin: echo 'Building admin dashboard...' && cd admin-dashboard && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../dist/admin/ && mkdir -p ../dist/admin/assets && cp -r src/assets/* ../dist/admin/assets/
scripts.build:student: echo 'Building student dashboard...' && cd student-dashboard && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && CI=false npm run build && cp -r build/* ../dist/student/
scripts.create:redirects:
echo 'Creating _redirects file...' && echo '# Static assets
/admin/assets/*  /admin/assets/:splat   200
/student/images/*  /student/images/:splat   200

# Admin app
/admin/index.html  /admin/index.html  200
/admin/*  /admin/index.html  200!

# Student app
/student/index.html  /student/index.html  200
/student/*  /student/index.html  200!

# Intake route
/intake/index.html  /admin/index.html  200
/intake/*  /admin/index.html  200!

# Default fallback
/index.html  /index.html  200
/*  /index.html  200!' > dist/_redirects
